Name: Sugo
Review Text: Delicious pizza, lovely service, the large was a lot for one person,  I took a third home and it was a perfect lunch the next day. Next time I would get two different smalls. Great place for families and a casual stop.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Cute place, interior is very nice. The pizzas however, were a bit disappointing. I chose a mix of three slices: tuna (not a fan at all, a bit watery), vegan karma kebab (didn‚Äôt have any taste) and the caramelized onions and sriracha (very ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text:
The food was nice and delicious!
It seems to be quiet in the restaurant, not a lot of people but it would be more vibey if there was music playing on the background, since I saw speakers upstairs too.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: For me the best Pizza I have ever had. There are certain things that I always plan to visit when coming to Amsterdam and going to Sugo Pizza is always number 1. The variety and quality of the Pizza is just unbeatable, I love the dough! ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Pizza, lasagna, sandwiches. Nice place for a quick bite.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: The pizza's were very delicious! They got a wide variety of flavors and they were very nice and wel mannered as well. The waiter explained the concept for us when we have taken our seats. We got two slices for each person and drinks. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: The pizza is okay but the short haired "store manager" lady is extremely problematic. My friend ordered a slice of pizza and asked for tap water and she refused to give it to us saying we only ordered one slice. Seriously what the heck? Have you heard of management and service?

Name: Sugo
Review Text: I think the pizzas here are really delicious even though I heard some negative comments about the pizza quality. The reason might be the dough because it's quite thick when compared to regular pizzas but it's crispy and very delicious to me so I'll definitely come back. I even got a very cute surprise for my take away order! ‚ô•Ô∏è

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Very delicious!  Vegan option is good as well.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Starter was a Delicious "big üçë" salade. That we couldn't finish R pizza's & desserts. Had to take it with us & finish them of later. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Vero good pizza in Amsterdam. The quality of the dough is super good but I give 4 stara only because some products they use on the pizza are not always the high standard. Overall it is definitely a place to go for pizza.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Super delish!  Awesome take on urban, fast food pizza with a great diverse selection.   A tad on the expensive side these days tho (I remember getting a much better bang for buck a couple years ago).

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Pizza ok! I feel it can improve in terms of quality, but it‚Äôs a quite unique concept around here, there aren‚Äôt many pizza al taglio places in AMS and it‚Äôs extremely similar to an Italian one! It makes you feel there.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: After 1h30 still no order - I contacted them and they told me the driver was on its way ( it‚Äôs 2 mn from my place ) after another 30 mn I called again and they said they needed 30 mn to prepare the order. So it would have been 2 hours for ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text:
Different than the regular thin or thick crust pizzas you get everywhere.
I had the mushroom pizza (recommended by the staff) and gardenia pizza with extra cheese. I personally really liked it. Definitely a must try place in Amsterdam.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: The pizzas were delicious and crunchy with great prices. The service was great. They're really friendly to the customers (to us) although we didn't speak with a proper English. Really recommended.

Name: Sugo
Review Text:
One of my local pizza places that has plenty of meat and vegetarian options.
In short, 4 Stars for friendly staff, clean establishment, and fresh (but relatively expensive) pizza. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: The pizza slices were good and the staff was friendly. The coffee was not too bad too. Good place to get some food while you're on the go.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Decent pizza for relatively cheap price. Better to take away as you need to wait a while before you get served otherwise

Name: Sugo
Review Text: I appreciate that they have vegan options, but they make you wait for a long time even if there is no one else. Moreover, my slice of pizza was burnt.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: A great, affordable pan pizza place in Amsterdam!  We especially loved it because they had several vegan options.  Pizzas are already made.  You pick from the selection and they heat it in their pizza oven.  Tasty, quick, and affordable!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Such a wonderful and neat little restsurant. The pizza is amazing and the staff may be even more amazing. Unfortunately they don't have gluten free pizza, but because the dough is natural you won't have to worry about it. The prizes are also really good with ‚Ç¨3.99 per slice, an dht edrinks are also pretty well priced.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Great pizza and service. I stayed for a bit and enjoyed the music too. Nice staff.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Delicious pizza and many options to choose from. This place truly has amazing quality and the last time I had a pizza like this, was in Italy.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Awesome..  delicious pizza and the Staff are nice and so friendly.. i highly recommand you to try it .. you wont regret it...

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Extremely good pizza...very good base and very nice service.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Amazing pizza and super friendly staff

Name: Sugo
Review Text: the closest thing in Amsterdam to the squares pizza's of Rome. prices are good and not too expensive. place is nice design and team is always friendly. my only recommend to the management to  let the clients add their on spices as Tabasco, oregano and zo in a small area by the door. this was missing!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Great place, friendly staff and most of all delicious healthy pizza. We ate various pizzas and all of them was delicious.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Good pizza. Slice has a good size. They have birra morata!üòÅ

Name: Sugo
Review Text: This place is very interesting. They have a lot Pizza's with different ingredients on them. So far the one with Wallnuts and Rucola is my favorite. Prices are decent and staff is friendly.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Sugo a la Casa! Fresh pizza ready to bake off at home and so we did...and yes we nailed it. The only downside is that Sugo only has stores in Amsterdam and Rotterdam. Our kids love it, so it's worth the detour.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: We came in late so understandibly they didnt have many vegan slices left, but we had the vegan margarita and it was very good!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Totally disappointed about the desserts. Doesn‚Äôt look like the pictures on the website! And I am not even talking about the taste...

Name: Sugo
Review Text: On the hunt for some good vego food I stumbled upon Sugo. Lots of choices, so go nuts. The mint tea was really nice as well.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Fast and friendly service, great location on Ferdinand Bolstraat. Pizzas are mediocre, selection is varied.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: A nice place to eat and paying a good value! Good pizzas, nice staff but don‚Äôt buy panacotta! Really expensive and taste like industrial food, really bad unfortunately!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: This restaurant employee was very kindness to us and pizza tasty very very very good, beer is fantastic, price not much expensive also! if I go to Amsterdam again, I will should visit there

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Amazing pizza's! Crispy and fresh toppings, very tasty! The cannoli were very nice too! Definitely recommend going here!

Name: Sugo
Review Text:
Delicious pizza,
Fresh salad and great tiramisu ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Amazing pizza with a different style! Love the place and the people serving is always very friendly

Name: Sugo
Review Text:
Fresh takes on the old formula of Pizza al Taglio, Sugo will work wonders on your taste buds!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Super delicious, cheap prices and friendly staff. Authentic Italian cuisine for sure

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Good pizza but location is not so nice to dine in. Would recommend to take the pizza to go.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: We ordered pizza and pasta,... Oeps! I mean two pasta's! Or...oke.. It was 1 lasagna and 1 pasta, but after a some glasses of gin I forgot what my girlfriend ordered. üòÇ But what I didn't forget,.... That this was fenomenal! Great lasagna, great pasta! As soon as Corona is over, I'm going back for a table for 2!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Great pizza. Super friendly staff. Gave us free beer and flowers. Also a great vegan selection with tasty meat alternatives. Definitely coming back!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Good food, very friendly customer service. Very good prices too. 12 EUR for 2 and half slices, and a drink. Good music too, ezClap

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Good products, nice place, will keep the address ;)

Name: Sugo
Review Text: very tasty food and nice service. extra stars for the music alone. so good

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Great place for a quick but nice bite to eat. Lots of locations across Amsterdam (also found one in Rotterdam. Reasonable price for nice pizza. The slice sizes (full or half) mean you can try a variety of flavours of you cant decide. Lots of options for everyone, even fussy ones.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Very tasty pizza, however arrogant personnel. This was the second time I came to get pizza and they were closing way too early. I mean, they were closing shop at 21.15 while they even said their closing time is 22.00. I don't understand why they are closing earlier than they mention. Very disappointing again.

Name: Sugo
Review Text:
Worst experience ever.
Last sunday me and my boyfriend decided to order a Sugo pizza at this place.  It took more than 1,5 hour before the pizza's has arrived. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: This is some good, straightfoward pizza here. Tasted just like I remember Italy. Thanks!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: So, I have to say that I have always ordered online from Sugo, but today I was in the Pijp and I decided to stop to eat a bite of some fresh and amazing pizza, so I went in and I ordered a quattro formaggi and I asked if they had one of my ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Just not good and in no way "italien kitchen"! The worst tuna-pizza ever!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: They have very different toppings on the Pizza here. Really liked it!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Some delicious pizza! Love the red and green pesto ones. Goat cheese one is recommended too if you're into that. Apparently 20 grams of protein per slice, which us very impressive!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Best place to eat Italian food in Amsterdam, fantastic pizza and low prices

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Tasty pizzas and delightful staff ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Sugo
Review Text:
Friendly staff with a good location,  it's hard to pick a pizza with so many choices and they all look so great!
We got our food within a few minutes of ordering and the waiters bring it ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: The pizzas are great and price is great too for what they are. Customer service with the person who served me was cheaper than the pizza slice. To the guy with the shaved head, tanned and a stubble beard; I and the other people who would ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Nothing special dough toppings sliced. Yet it is nice to have places like this where you can grab a quick tasty cheapish snack on the go. I remember a few years ago the only street food was hotdogs üå≠.... üòí ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Always great pizza, room to sit upstairs even at 6pm, great tiramisu. Pretty cheap eats for Amsterdam. Friendly but very busy staff. We left completely stuffed, ordering just four pieces for three people (around 14 euro).

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Pretty good, best pizza I've had in Amsterdam. Worth a try.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Fast, tasty, good price... many vegetarian slices. Best of this type of pizzeria, where you can try several various pizza slices. We liked tiramisu as well. I would recommend Sugo if you are nearby for lunch or dinner

Name: Sugo
Review Text: One of the best pizza al taglio i know in Amsterdam. I would say quite good also compared to Italian standards! They have a very wide choice and the place is very cozy for eating a quick bite inside. Only downside the prices, which are a bit high. But for a pizza place in De Pijp I cannot expect much less... Definitely try it out!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Excellent pizza- meat- vegetarian-vegan options- fluffy- focaccia style pizza you can get 1/2 + 1/2 slices and try all kinds! Fresh salads, the goat cheese salad was delicious. And cannoli for dessert- almond brittle shell stuffed with ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Just delicious pizza for a reasonable price :)

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Great pizza, many different topping options.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: With love from Italy! I find this place very cozy! They have a great variety of pizzas! Nice place to come with friends! You can also bring your laptop here and use it while you eat! Free-Wifi access! Very friendly staff!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: The pizzas are tasty with quality ingredients. The stuff is very polite & friendly. I find the prices a bit high for a slice of pizza, but that's my only remark about Sugo.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: I really love this pizzeria. Always a fabulous selection of pizza slices, great service and a pleasant vibe. Regularly got take aways and sat in. Absolutely amazing nut brittle and  chocolate fondant caneloni that is unparalleled. I loved the tip jars.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Quick. Average price. Good choice of toppings.   Crust tasted like cardboard.  I am a pizza snob though, grew up in NY.  This place wouldn't last a week back home.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: VERY good Italian pizza üçï‚ù§Ô∏è many flavors, awesome service and a nice crew. If u are looking for good&fast food just go.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: The pizza is not bad and the price are good, but the personal is not nice and moody. But the worst is this place has mice! After having eaten I discovered with disgust a small mouse alive under my table, probably waiting something to fall ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Awesome! Tasty, generous slices of pizza, friendly staff and a free rose to go! How nice!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Sugo is not trendy Neopolitan, it's a unique presentation and flavor, well-crafted, Crunchy. Yummy and comforting. Great for groups because you buy by the (rectangular) slice and can try many varieties. Vegan and vegetarian options that ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Awesome place. It's tucked away between other shops, and it's a very cozy little place. There is a great selection of pizza available by the slice, and the prices are reasonable. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Not as good as it was. They now have a chef who cannot stop whistling. .Also do not fill in their online evaluation card. They get your e-mail to send you promo stuff but the promised free pizza voucher never arrives.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Extraordinary good pizza for a good price! Best of all is that it's sold in slices, so you don't have to choose one. Good stop for a quick snack, lunch or cheap dinner.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Great pizza, good flavours and toppings. Awesome tiramisu. Delivery was fast!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: It's OK. Pizza isn't pizza at all, rather call it a focaccia or something similar. Place itself is pleasant and the selection of drinks too.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: If you want to understand what really pizza gourmet is then you gotta visit this place and enjoy their high quality products for a fair price. Gentle staff and a cozy place complete the experience.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Great choice of pizza slices on light base. About half varieties are vegetarian with vegan made to order. Two slices make a good sized meal.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: It¬¥s one thing to eat goood food. The other thing what makes us people happy, are other happy people. The staff at Sugo at the Sarphatipark is just wonderful. Full of good vibes and I always have a good reason to go there, because the ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Some of the best pizza you'll find in Amsterdam.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Tasty food, interesting concept. It feels more like focaccia than pizza but it's tasty anyway. Good selection

Review Text: Super relaxed pizza place. Prices are good and everything was home made in their kitchen. Service was great and of course the food was very yummy!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Great food, friendly staff.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Very best pizza ever!

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Very good selection with 3 vegan options, extremely tasty. I would be wary with dietary requirements due to allergies as I can see cross contamination of nuts etc may be quite easily done.

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Great place for Italian üç∫ and some good üçï. They also have Vegan üçï and they serve by slices. They also have enough sitting so if you want some downtime, Sugo is a good place to eat and drink.

Name: Sugo

Name: Sugo

Name: Sugo
Review Text: Like eating Pizza Al Taglio in Italy. Very creative combinations of flavors. Service is friendly, yet the warming up of the pizzas is a little slow

Name: Sugo

Name: Sugo

Name: Sugo

Name: Sugo
